modName: Player House based on a Real Life Home
summary: Title  says it all, this is a player house based on a real life home, my apartment basically.
descriptionHtml:
Title  says it all, this is a player house based on a real life home, my apartment basically.

HOWEVER, this is not even near 100% what the real life one is.
(I would say it's 80% similar at least)

This house is a little bigger and has less furnitures than the real thing (no eletronics for example, with the exception of a imitation of my TV lol).

The toilets are awful too (I suck at housing mods, didn't think of a cool way of creating a bathroom).

This is just a house based on my apartment, none of the levers do anything (I wanted to make them do stuff but couldn't progress with them).

This player home is really just for you to stay and store your stuff, not one of these huge exploring homes.

Oh and of course this mod is nothing compared to the good house mods.
This is just a crappy one hehe.

If you need permission for anything just pm me.

Requires:

The Nexus Mod Manager.
The latest Skyrim version.

UPDATE 1.1 DETAILS:
- I changed the location of the house (see in the images if you need to).

- If you saved your game inside the house or made it the home of any followers then I suggest you:
   -Leave the house and get your items.
   -Remove any relation any of your followers have with the house.
   -If you can't do any of the above your game will freeze in the loading screen if you get this update I think.
   -If you don't want to do any of the above then just don't download it, it's just location change after all :)

- For some the reason the new version has 136kb instead of 56kbs even though all I did was change the location :(  Not sure what was my mistake.

By the way if something appears asking about replacing a file with the same name just say yes.
author: Markdobrasil
